justification: Acknowledges B’s desire for stability but overestimates appeal: Josh Robinson is a Tier 5 RB in a likely run-heavy/low-volume context B tends to fade, while B trusts rankings and already has multiple Tier 1 RBs. Asking for B’s Tier 1 WR (plus another WR) is lopsided. Rationale is brief and light on concrete roster/role details.
